code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import api from'../services/api';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,scale:0.95},animate:{opacity:1,scale:1},transition:{duration:0.4},className:"p-4 bg-gray-900 rounded",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{className:"w-full p-2 bg-black text-white rounded"})});const Questionnaire=()=>{const[genre,setGenre]=useState('');const[lang,setLang]=useState('');const[mood,setMood]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async()=>{const res=await api.post('/recommend',{genre,lang,mood});navigate('/results',{state:res.data});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center space-y-4 mt-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>setGenre(e.target.value),className:"p-2 bg-gray-900 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Favorite Genre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Rock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Pop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Jazz"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>setLang(e.target.value),className:"p-2 bg-gray-900 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Language"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"English"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Spanish"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Hindi"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>setMood(e.target.value),className:"p-2 bg-gray-900 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Mood"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Happy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Relaxed"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Energetic"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,className:"px-6 py-3 bg-purple-700 rounded hover:bg-purple-800 transition",children:"Get Recommendations"})]});};export default Questionnaire;
